meanings.definition: Extremely heavy or weighing a very large amount.
meanings.sent1: The box was ultraheavy and difficult to lift.
meanings.sent2: The ultraheavy suitcase made it hard to carry all my clothes.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the ultraheavy bag felt like a workout in itself.
meanings.sent4: The ultraheavy burden of responsibility weighed heavily on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The ultraheavy rock sank to the bottom of the lake.

meanings.definition: Of great intensity or extreme degree.
meanings.sent1: The storm brought an ultraheavy downpour of rain.
meanings.sent2: Her ultraheavy workload left her feeling exhausted.
meanings.sent3: The ultraheavy rain made the streets look like rivers.
meanings.sent4: The ultraheavy emotions overwhelmed him during the movie.
meanings.sent5: The ultraheavy silence in the room made everyone uncomfortable.
